languages.text: "Неплохо, но слишком прямолинейно. Не хватает легкого шарма безумия. Я попрошу Идиру показать тебе, как надо".
"Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."
languages.original_text: "Неплохо, но слишком прямолинейно. Не хватает легкого шарма безумия. Я попрошу Идиру показать тебе, как надо".

traits.locale_text: "Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."
"Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."
"Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."
"Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."
"Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."

languages.text: « Pas mal, mais un peu trop quelconque à mon goût. Il vous manque la petite touche de folie qui ferait tout votre charme. Vous devriez en parler avec Idira, c'est une experte en la matière. »
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."

traits.locale_text: « Pas mal, mais un peu trop quelconque à mon goût. Il vous manque la petite touche de folie qui ferait tout votre charme. Vous devriez en parler avec Idira, c'est une experte en la matière. »

languages.text: «No está mal, pero muy simple para mi gusto. Le falta el encanto de la locura. Debería decirle a Idira que te diera unas lecciones».
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."

traits.locale_text: «No está mal, pero muy simple para mi gusto. Le falta el encanto de la locura. Debería decirle a Idira que te diera unas lecciones».

languages.text: 「悪くはないが、地味すぎるな。お前には狂気の魅力が足りない。イディラに手本を見せてやるよう言うべきかもしれないな」
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."

traits.locale_text: 「悪くはないが、地味すぎるな。お前には狂気の魅力が足りない。イディラに手本を見せてやるよう言うべきかもしれないな」

languages.text: “还不错，但太平淡无奇了，不合我的口味。你缺乏疯狂的魅力，我应该让伊迪拉给你示范一下。”
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."

traits.locale_text: “还不错，但太平淡无奇了，不合我的口味。你缺乏疯狂的魅力，我应该让伊迪拉给你示范一下。”

languages.text: "Nicht schlecht, aber zu offensichtlich für meinen Geschmack. Was Euch fehlt, ist ein Hauch von Wahnsinn. Ich sollte Idira bitten, Euch zu zeigen, wie es geht."
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht schlecht, aber zu offensichtlich für meinen Geschmack. Was Euch fehlt, ist ein Hauch von Wahnsinn. Ich sollte Idira bitten, Euch zu zeigen, wie es geht."

languages.text: "Fena değil ama benim için biraz fazla yavan. Sende deliliğin verdiği o çekicilik pek yok. İdira'dan sana bu işin nasıl yapılması gerektiğini öğretmesini istemeliyim."
languages.original_text: "Not bad, but too plain for my taste. You lack a certain charm of madness. I should ask Idira to show you how it's done."
